attributes.action: Stop The Local Development Framework For Roberttown, Kirklees
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Kirklees Local Authority have distributed plans for a Local Development Framework accross the whole of Kirklees. One of the areas affected by this is the village of Roberttown where upto 2330 houses are proposed and around 300 acres of of commercial development. 

This development is to be carried out on green belt land and would destroy the geen belt views around the village for as far as the eye can see.

The Infrastructure within the village and surrounding area is in no way able to cope with such radical development. This development is proposed to be carried out over the next 15 years. A committee of local residents has now been formed and we ask for your support in the fight against the LDF simply by signing our petition here!

rejection.details: Please contact Kirklees Local Authority with your concerns
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
